data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Sassuolo take a 0-1 lead thanks to Hamed Junior Traore.
In the minute 3, Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
In the minute 5, In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Giovanni Ayroldi awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Free kick Sampdoria.
In the minute 7, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In Genoa Sampdoria attack through Maya Yoshida. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
Sampdoria are pushing forward but Fabio Quagliarella's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Vlad Chiriches for Sassuolo is whistled offside.
Domenico Berardi of Sassuolo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 12, Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Domenico Berardi (Sassuolo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Francesco Caputo for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Sassuolo.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
Giovanni Ayroldi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Omar Colley (Sampdoria) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Sassuolo at Luigi Ferraris.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a throw-in for Sampdoria, close to Sassuolo's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
In the minute 20, Domenico Berardi of Sassuolo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Throw-in for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
Jakub Jankto (Sampdoria) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 21, In Genoa Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez is caught offside.
Fabio Quagliarella (Sampdoria) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
In the minute 24, Sampdoria's Albin Ekdal misses with an attempt on goal.
Giovanni Ayroldi awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Sassuolo.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Genoa to check on Mert Muldur, who is grimacing with pain.
Mert Muldur has recovered and rejoins the match in Genoa.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Sampdoria.
Sassuolo's Francesco Caputo breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Giovanni Ayroldi awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
The match at Luigi Ferraris has been interrupted briefly for a check on Morten Thorsby, who is down injured.
Sampdoria needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Sampdoria's Morten Thorsby is back in action after a slight knock.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 34, In Genoa, Omar Colley (Sampdoria) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Francesco Caputo (Sassuolo) has received a yellow card from Giovanni Ayroldi.
In the minute 35, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Adrien Silva (Sampdoria) has replaced the possibly injured Morten Thorsby.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
In the minute 39, Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in Sassuolo.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Sampdoria drive upfield and Fabio Quagliarella gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Lorenzo Tonelli (Sampdoria) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Sassuolo.
Francesco Magnanelli (Sassuolo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Adrien Silva (Sampdoria) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Giorgos Kyriakopoulos for Sassuolo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 46, Giovanni Ayroldi awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Sassuolo at Luigi Ferraris.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 49, Omar Colley (Sampdoria) has received a first yellow card.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 53, Sampdoria's Fabio Quagliarella gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Fabio Quagliarella.
In the minute 55, Great play from Maya Yoshida to set up the goal.
Goal! Sassuolo have got their heads in front thanks to a Francesco Caputo strike.
Domenico Berardi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sassuolo.
In the minute 58, Jeremie Boga for Sassuolo drives towards goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal! Sassuolo extend their lead to 1-3 through Domenico Berardi.
In the minute 59, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a Sassuolo throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
The away team replace Francesco Magnanelli with Pedro Obiang.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria's Fabio Quagliarella gets in a shot on goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
In the minute 63, Throw-in Sassuolo.
Sassuolo pushes forward through Giorgos Kyriakopoulos, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 64, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Emil Audero for Sampdoria who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Sampdoria’s Emil Audero is on his feet again at Luigi Ferraris.
Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sampdoria's half?
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Sassuolo.
Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Genoa.
In the minute 68, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Sampdoria just outside Sassuolo's area.
Vlad Chiriches for Sassuolo has been booked by Giovanni Ayroldi and receives a first yellow card.
In Genoa, Gaston Ramirez of Sampdoria is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 70, Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
At Luigi Ferraris, Lorenzo Tonelli has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 73, Mehdi Leris is replacing Maya Yoshida for the home team.
Sassuolo make their second substitution with Kaan Ayhan replacing Mert Muldur.
Roberto De Zerbi is making the team's third substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Giacomo Raspadori replacing Francesco Caputo.
In the minute 73, The home team have replaced Mikkel Damsgaard with Antonio Candreva. This is the second substitution made today by Claudio Ranieri.
Keita Balde is replacing Gaston Ramirez for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Free kick Sassuolo.
In the minute 75, Giovanni Ayroldi signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sassuolo drives forward and Hamed Junior Traore gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 78, Sampdoria's Keita Balde is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Sassuolo.
Sampdoria's Albin Ekdal is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 81, Sassuolo drive upfield and Jeremie Boga gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sampdoria defender.
Claudio Ranieri (Sampdoria) is making a fifth substitution, with Valerio Verre replacing Jakub Jankto.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In the minute 82, Antonio Candreva (Sampdoria) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jeremie Boga (Sassuolo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Genoa Sampdoria drive forward through Keita Balde. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 83, Fabio Quagliarella gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sampdoria.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Goal! Keita Balde pulls one back to make it 2-3.
In the minute 84, Antonio Candreva with an assist there.
Antonio Candreva (Sampdoria) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Lukas Haraslin is on a sub for Domenico Berardi for Sassuolo.
Federico Peluso is replacing Vlad Chiriches for Sassuolo at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Giovanni Ayroldi.
Sampdoria surge into the attack at Luigi Ferraris but Keita Balde’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Giovanni Ayroldi will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Sampdoria are coming forward and Antonio Candreva gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Giovanni Ayroldi awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Hamed Junior Traore for Sassuolo is back on the field again.
Giovanni Ayroldi awards the home team a throw-in.
Giovanni Ayroldi signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-3.
Keita Balde (Sampdoria) has been shown a straight red card by referee Giovanni Ayroldi.
Hamed Junior Traore is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Sassuolo's Manuel Locatelli has been booked in Genoa.
